personal.preferred_title: Senior Data Engineer | Capacity Planning & AI-Driven Infrastructure Optimization
personal.address: Murphy, TX (Plano area) / 424 Oriole Dr., Murphy, TX 75094

summary: Senior Data Engineer with over 20 years of enterprise experience, specializing in modern data stacks, data pipelines, and cloud architecture on AWS. Proficient in building scalable data lakehouse platforms and stream processing systems using PySpark and serverless AWS technologies like Glue, Athena, and S3. Expertise in JVM languages such as Java, alongside advanced skills in batch processing and event-driven systems. Adept at mentoring teams and driving data platform evolution to support BI, ML, and engineering needs. Passionate about contributing to PostScript’s mission of empowering ecommerce brands through innovative SMS marketing solutions. Excited to lead data engineering initiatives in a remote, high-growth environment.

experience.title: Senior Capacity & Data Engineer
bullets: Architected automated ETL data pipelines using Python and Pandas, ingesting telemetry data from 6,000+ endpoints, replacing manual processes for enhanced scalability.
Developed machine learning forecasting models with Prophet and scikit-learn to predict capacity bottlenecks 6 months ahead, improving provisioning accuracy.
Designed optimized Oracle schemas for historical data retention, enabling seasonal risk forecasting and robust reporting.
Integrated disparate data feeds into unified Oracle reporting systems, creating executive dashboards for actionable insights.
Identified underutilized infrastructure through data mining, driving significant cost savings via hardware consolidation.
Built automated workflows and interactive dashboards using Python libraries like matplotlib and plotly to support data-driven decisions.

experience.title: Performance Engineer
bullets: Managed Dynatrace AppMon and Synthetics for critical systems, ensuring performance monitoring for Brand.com.
Led 'FAST' project to data-mine real-user performance metrics, providing optimization recommendations for key systems.
Upgraded Dynatrace from 6.5 to 7.0, implemented TLS1.2 security, and supported cloud migration to AWS.
Developed dashboards for end-to-end functionality and performance metrics analysis.
Analyzed system bottlenecks and proposed actionable performance improvements.
Integrated Performance Center with Dynatrace for comprehensive monitoring solutions.

experience.title: APM Consultant
bullets: Supported enterprise CA APM, CEM, and ADA for utility systems monitoring.
Managed and supported monitoring solutions to ensure system reliability and performance.

experience.title: Senior Consultant / SME for CA APM
bullets: Led large-scale CA APM implementations and upgrades (9.1 to 10.1), managing 4,000–6,000 agents across enterprise environments.
Designed custom Management Modules, dashboards, and alerts, alongside Perl/Ksh scripts for data extraction.
Provided sizing recommendations, created Golden Images, and delivered client training on APM solutions.
Resolved performance bottlenecks in J2EE and .NET environments through detailed analysis.
Served as CA APM SME for TIAA-CREF, overseeing 50+ Enterprise Managers for robust monitoring.
Collaborated with IT teams to troubleshoot and optimize performance in complex WebLogic environments.

experience.title: Performance Test Engineer
bullets: Analyzed J2EE telecom applications to identify load and break points, documenting key metrics like JDBC, threads, and CPU usage.
Installed JMX, Thread Dumps, and Wily Introscope for performance monitoring and diagnostics.
Created automation scripts to streamline performance testing processes.
Provided detailed reports on memory, CPU, and garbage collection metrics for optimization.

experience.title: Senior Systems & Data Migration Engineer
bullets: Led migration of 200+ MySQL nodes to a 6-node Oracle RAC cluster for a high-throughput shopping engine.
Optimized C++ and OCCI transaction processing, reducing hardware footprint by 95% while maintaining sub-second latency.
Built a CPPUNIT testing framework to automate conversion and ensure data integrity.
Designed scalable database architectures to handle 10x the throughput of VISA transactions.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless migration and performance.

experience.title: Architect/Developer (IRS CADE Project)
bullets: Conducted UML design and developed modules for a CICS/MQSeries/XML/DB2 system.
Focused on IRS modernization through UML-based unit design and implementation.
Worked on messaging architecture using VC++ and DB2 for robust system integration.

experience.title: Developer / Support Engineer (Billing, Interfaces, CSM/PRMS)
bullets: Developed high-availability multithreaded C++ interfaces using POSIX, sockets, and Marconi APIs.
Enhanced billing system performance with C/C++/Pro*C/PL/SQL, achieving 75% memory reduction and 10x database performance.
Automated system administration for WebLogic/WebSphere environments using Korn Shell scripts.
Designed interfaces with UML in Rational Rose, incorporating design patterns like Functors and Containers.
Troubleshot and supported Enabler/CSM/EMS modules, ensuring operational stability.
Implemented database fixes and performance optimizations for production systems.

experience.title: Developer
bullets: Developed time and attendance interfaces using VB6 and VC++ for operational efficiency.

experience.title: Lab Support
bullets: Maintained and troubleshot Linux and Windows systems as part of the Lab Support team.
Performed various administrative tasks to ensure lab functionality and user support.

flagship_projects.name: Serverless Lakehouse Platform (AWS)
flagship_projects.description: Designed a full serverless data platform using S3, Glue, Athena, and Bedrock. Built a Text-to-SQL GenAI agent with Claude 3 Sonnet. Resolved small file issues using Snappy and Parquet compression. Optimized ETL and data access for enterprise-scale operations.

flagship_projects.name: HorizonScale — AI Capacity Forecasting Engine
flagship_projects.description: Replaced legacy manual processes with a parallel generator-based pipeline, reducing forecasting cycles by 90%. Developed an interactive Streamlit dashboard for real-time capacity insights and 'High Trust' utilization scores. Created a modern agentic pipeline for banking-scale telemetry. Repository includes code, documentation, and performance benchmarks.

flagship_projects.name: FAST Project
flagship_projects.description: Conducted data mining on user performance metrics to optimize critical money-generating systems.
